lead_paragraph: MAGER--Arthur D.,beloved husband of Sandra and son of Morris and Ethel of Cedarhurst, NY, expired on January 24. Born July 27, 1927, he was a dedicated husband, father (Dan, Andy, Amy, Ellen) and grandfather who made a positive difference in the lives of his family and community. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MAGER, ARTHUR D.
